landingPage.title: Virtual lines that save time.
landingPage.description: Fiefoe helps you find create and monitor virtual queues and generate more sales by increasing throughput and customer satisfaction.

abandonedScreen.footer: Requeue or create your own queue at

shareScreen.message: Scan the QR code or enter the ID

summonScreen.reach_by_cont: to keep your spot in line.
summonScreen.footer: Requeue or create your own queue at

homePage.join_code_wrong: The join code must be 6 digits
homePage.name_missing: We need to know your name for reference
homePage.phone_number_missing: We need your number to notify you
homePage.phone_number_too_long: You have a very long phone number!
homePage.phone_number_not_number: That doesn't look like a phone number...
homePage.name: Your name
homePage.footer: to create your own virtual queue at
homePage.cannot_enqueue_message: Something wrong happened (we should be more specific about this)
homePage.join_code_not_exist_message: It looks like the join code you entered doesn't match any queue we have on record. Please check your code and try again, or use the QR code scanner.
homePage.queue_paused_or_inactive_message: It looks like the queue you're trying to join is either paused or inactive. Please try again or ask the organizer for details.

createQueuePage.business_name_helper: What's the name of your business, event, or venue?
createQueuePage.queue_cap_helper: Set a maximum line capacity. We will turn away anyone if your venue is at capacity.
createQueuePage.grace_period_helper: Set a grace period for summoned queuers to reach your venue.
createQueuePage.grace_period_placeholder: No grace period (summoned queuers have unlimited time to arrive).
createQueuePage.party_size_helper: Set a maximum party size that a queuer can represent
createQueuePage.party_size_placeholder: Queuers cannot queue for anyone other than themselves.
createQueuePage.offline_time_helper: Set a maximum time limit that a queuer can be offline for.
createQueuePage.offline_time_placeholder: Queuers can be offline for any amount of time.
createQueuePage.address_helper: Set your address so that queuers can find your venue.
createQueuePage.password_helper: Set your address so that queuers can find your venue.

userDashboard.index_tooltip: This is you position in line.
userDashboard.waited_tooltip: This is how long you've waited in line, from the moment you joined to now.
userDashboard.average_tooltip: The average wait in minutes of all your fellow queuers in this line.
userDashboard.eta_tooltip: The estimated time of your arrival, calculated by combining the average along with a few other stats.
userDashboard.cannot_fetch_user_data: Something went wrong and we can't seem to be able to get your data right now... Please try again soon.

deferPositionModal.body: Are you sure you want to defer your position once? This will swap your position with the queuer behind you.

leaveQueueAlert.dialog: Are you sure you want to abandon your position in line? You will have to enter the code again and start from the end of the line if you choose to rejoin.

endQueueAlert.dialog: Are you sure you want to end this queue? All enqueued users will be kicked and this queue will be permanently deleted.
endQueueAlert.cannot_end_queue_message: Something went wrong and we can't seem to be able to end the queue right now... Please try again soon.

queueDashboardMenu.cannot_fetch_share_data_message: Something went wrong and we can't seem to be able to end the queue right now... Please try again soon

queuesPage.cannot_fetch_queue_message: Something went wrong and we can't seem to be able to update the queue data right now... We're working on a fix.

servicedPage.cannot_fetch_serviced_message: Something went wrong and we can't seem to be able to update the serviced data right now... We're working on a fix.

abandonedPage.cannot_fetch_abandoned_message: Something went wrong and we can't seem to be able to update the abandoned data right now... We're working on a fix.

enqueuedPage.cannot_fetch_enqueued_message: Something went wrong and we can't seem to be able to update the enqueued data right now... We're working on a fix.

queueDashboard.enqueued_tooltip: The number of queuers currently waiting in this line.
queueDashboard.serviced_tooltip: The number of queuers you have serviced since this line started.
queueDashboard.deferred_tooltip: The number of queuers that have deferred at least once since joining the queue.
queueDashboard.average_tooltip: The average wait of queuers since this line started.
queueDashboard.abandoned_tooltip: The number of queuers that have since abandoned their position in line.
queueDashboard.noshow_tooltip: The number of queuers that were summoned but did not arrive before the grace period.

QRCodeScanner.message: We are going live in July!
QRCodeScanner.confirmation: Bar code with type {{type}} and data {{data}} has been scanned!

errorScreen.message: Uh... This is awkward! It seems like whatever you're trying to access can't be found. Maybe find your way back at

signUpForm.emailUndefinedError: Oops! Looks like you forgot to provide an email...
signUpForm.emailInvalidError: Oops! Looks like you didn't enter a valid email...
signUpForm.passwordUndefinedError: Oops! Looks like you forgot to provide a password...
signUpForm.passwordUnmatchError: Oops! Looks like your passwords didn't match...

logInModal.subtitle: Hello and Welcome!

verifySMSModal.title: Verify your phone number
verifySMSModal.cannot_fetch_verify_sms_message: Something went wrong and we can't seem to be able to verify your SMS right now... We're working on a fix.

confirmDeleteAlert.header: Are you sure you want to do this?
confirmDeleteAlert.message: Deleting a {{entity}} is permanent and cannot be undone.
